message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. However, I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $100 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I see where you're coming from, Alice. Let me make one last offer. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
